title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the project requirements, including the target users, desired features, expected functionality, design constraints, performance goals, security considerations, and scalability requirements.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the AI model, user interface, and data storage components.

title: Develop AI Model
description: Research, design, and implement the AI model for generating and optimizing user interface designs.

title: Build User Interface
description: Design and develop the user interface for the AIUXDesigner tool, including the input and output interfaces.

title: Implement Data Storage and Management
description: Design and implement the data storage and management system for user data, preferences, and generated designs.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Establish a CI/CD pipeline for automated testing, building, and deployment of the application.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Implement security measures to protect user data and ensure the application's integrity.

title: Create Documentation and User Guides
description: Develop comprehensive documentation and user guides for the AIUXDesigner tool.

title: Conduct Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Plan and execute a comprehensive testing strategy, including unit tests, integration tests, and user acceptance testing.
